msContents.summary: Short day by day register of payments for poll-tax (and/or other taxes)

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank

condition.ab: Complete; the surface of the ostracon is damaged at the right edge

origin.origDate: (Middle of the) or late IInd century A.D.
origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Sambas son of Sokmenis grandson of Sambas (see also P.Mich. IV/2, p. 224)
Sabeinos son of Petesouchos and Apiane grandson of Petesouchos
Onnophris son of Petheus and Segathis grandson of Petheus
Eutyches, doulos of Papos (see also P.Mich. VI, 380)
Satabous son of Harmiysis grandson of Pnepheros
Heron son of Petheus and Taorsenouphis grandson of Kollouthos (see also P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)
Onnophris son of Petheus and Taonnophris grandson of Petheus (see also P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Kastor (son of Onnophris grandson of Petheus) (see also P.Mich. IV/2, p. 181)
Ptolemaios (son of Onnophris grandson of Petheus) (see also P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Sisoeis (Sisois) son of Karanos and Artemis grandson of Heras (Heraklas) (see also P.Mich. IV/2, p. 229)
Heron alias Heraklas (son of Karanos and Artemis grandson of Heras) (see also P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: The 3rd, likewise:;. . .: Sambas, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sambas: [- -];Herakl(--): Sabeinos, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, his mother being Apiane: [- -];Lebitos(?): Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, his mother being Segathis: [- -];Isidoros(?): Eutyches, slave of Papos: 4 dr.;The 4th, likewise: ;Satabous, son of Harmiysis, grandson of Pnepheros: [- -];The 5th, likewise:;Heron,son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthos, his mother being Taorsenouphis: [- -];Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, his mother being Taonnophris: [- -];Kastor, his son: [- -];Ptolemaios, an other (son): [- -];Sisois, son of Karanos, grandson of Heras, his mother being Artemis: [- -];Heron alias Heraklas, his [[son]] brother: [- -]

listBibl.bibl: Amundsen L, OMich I, 563, 1935 -- BL VII, 290 (l.3; 4; 5; 9; 10)
